Google Now Launcher is NOT Compatible

Google Now Launcher is NOT compatible with ANY Icon Packs. Please do not rate the icon pack negatively for this reason. There is a workaround that you can try by yourself, but it requires the use of an external app. Would you like to download it?

If the launcher you use is not listed here, you must apply the icons directly from the launcher settings.\nSome launchers do not support direct application.
Press a wallpaper to view it in FullScreen.\nLong press to apply it directly to your homescreen.
Tap the picture above to load another widget.
You need Zooper Widget Pro to be able to use the included skins.
You need Media Utilities to be able to use the music widgets with Zooper.

Use this to make the music widgets work. Open the MU, go to settings and make sure the following options are checked:

 ✓ Zooper
 ✓ Make Coverart available
 ✓ Send Song Progress
This will fix issues with widgets fonts.
This will fix issues with widgets iconsets.
This will fix issues with widgets bitmaps.

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: There\'s a bug in this theme!
Why aren\'t the dialer and contact apps themed?
Can you add more icons?
How can I help?
Can I make requests?
Why does the app need permission to modify or delete content of my storage?
Why does the app need permission to full network access?
Why does the app need permission to view connections?
Why does the app need permission to set wallpaper?
Why does the app need permission to adjust the wallpaper size?
Why does the app need permission to prevent phone from sleeping?

string-array.name: answers
string-array.item: Firstly, please make sure you\'ve rebooted your phone. If the issue is in some part that is essential, such as the notification drawer, it is likely not an issue on my side. If there truly is an issue however, feel free to post a bug report in my g+ community or send me an email. Please note that low ratings do not help solve the problems.
Those two apps have restrictions that prevents it from being transparent, which is why I have themed them in black for now. In the event that this is fixed, I will definitely make it transparent.

Please note that this is primarily a theme and not an icon pack. Though I will add some essential icons from time to time, I try to keep the icons limited to reduce the size of this app. If you want more icons, feel free to check some of my other icon packs.

I am one user, with one phone. By simply using my theme and reporting any errors, you are helping me keep track of everything, as not all the themed apps are apps that I use. Feel free to also join the beta community for more updates, and to help me fix issues before it\'s released for everyone. Donations also help a lot as well!

Though I don\'t exactly take in requests, especially for big apps since they take a long time (again, I am only one person), you may feel free to send them. Keep in mind that I am more likely to fulfill the request if it\'s a small app.
It\'s needed to be able write icon requests data and files, as well as saving wallpapers, and being able to change Wallpapers\' download location.
It\'s needed to be able to load the cloud based wallpapers and download them.
It\'s needed to be able to check if your device has internet connection.
It\'s needed to be able to apply wallpaper directly from the app.
It\'s needed to be able to adjust wallpapers dimensions based on your screen resolution.
It\'s needed for Muzei Live Wallpaper.

resources.string: Contact the dev because it seems there is something being missed in the app.

It seems like we aren\'t able to find a theme engine on your phone. If you know you have one, please open it and proceed from there. If you don\'t have one, please get a rom that supports either cyanogenmod or layers theming and follow their instructions.
